description.brazilian: Encontre o Chico ou a Paz
description.japanese: チコまたはパスと再会する

description.brazilian: Complete uma Op Paralela ou Extra
description.english: Clear a Side Op or Extra Op
description.french: Terminer une mission secondaire ou supplémentaire.
description.german: Schließe eine Neben- oder Zusatzmission ab.
description.italian: Completa una missione secondaria o una missione extra
description.japanese: SIDE OPSまたはEXTRA OPSのいずれかをクリアする
description.spanish: Completa una misión secundaria o extra.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões (incluindo Ops Paralelas e Extras)
description.english: Clear all missions (including Side Ops and Extra Ops)
description.french: Terminer toutes les missions (secondaires et supplémentaires incluses).
description.german: Schließe alle Missionen ab (einschließlich Neben- und Zusatzmissionen) .
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni (incluse missioni secondarie e missioni extra)
description.japanese: 全てのミッション（SIDE OPS・EXTRA OPSを含む）をクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите все миссии (включая побочные и дополнительные)
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones (incluyendo misiones secundarias y extra).

description.brazilian: Complete qualquer missão (incluindo Ops Paralelas e Extras) com classificação S
description.english: Clear any mission (including Side Ops and Extra Ops) with a S-rank
description.french: Terminer n'importe quelle mission (secondaire et supplémentaire incluses) au rang S.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission (einschließlich der Neben- und Zusatzmissionen) mit S-Rang ab.
description.italian: Completa una missione qualsiasi (incluse missioni secondarie e missioni extra) con valutazione S
description.japanese: いずれかのミッション（SIDE OPS・EXTRA OPSを含む）をSランクでクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите любую миссию (в том числе побочную или дополнительную), получив рейтинг S
description.spanish: Completa cualquier misión (incluyendo misiones secundarias y extra) con rango S.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões (incluindo Ops Paralelas e Extras) com classificação S
description.english: Clear all missions (including Side Ops and Extra Ops) with a S-rank
description.french: Terminer toutes les missions (secondaires et supplémentaires) au rang S.
description.german: Schließe alle Missionen (einschließlich der Neben- und Zusatzmissionen) mit S-Rang ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni (incluse missioni secondarie e missioni extra) con valutazione S
description.japanese: 全てのミッション（SIDE OPS・EXTRA OPSを含む）をSランクでクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите все миссии (в том числе побочные и дополнительные), получив рейтинг S
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones (incluyendo misiones secundarias y extra) con rango S.

description.brazilian: Na missão "Ground Zeroes", resgate o prisioneiro prestes a ser executado e extraia-o por helicóptero
description.english: In the "Ground Zeroes" mission, rescue the prisoner to be executed and extract him via chopper
description.french: Dans la mission "Ground Zeroes", sauver le prisonnier avant l'exécution et l'extraire par hélico.
description.german: Rette den zum Tode Verurteilten in der Mission "Ground Zeroes" mit dem Helikopter.
description.italian: Nella missione "Ground Zeroes", salva il prigioniero condannato ed estrailo con l'elicottero
description.japanese: MISSION『GROUND ZEROES』で処刑前の捕虜を救出してヘリに回収する
description.russian: В миссии "Эпицентры" освободите и эвакуируйте на вертолете заключенного, которого должны казнить
description.spanish: En la misión "Ground Zeroes", rescata al prisionero que será ejecutado y extráelo en helicóptero.

description.brazilian: Complete a Op Paralela "Eliminar a ameaça dos Renegados" extraindo os dois alvos
description.english: Clear the "Eliminate the Renegade Threat" Side Op by extracting both targets
description.french: Terminer la mission sec. "Éliminer la menace des renégats" en extrayant les 2 cibles par hélico.
description.german: Schließe die Nebenmission "Eliminiere die Deserteur-Bedrohung" ab, indem du beide Ziele extrahierst.
description.italian: Completa la missione secondaria "Elimina la minaccia dei giustizieri" estraendo i due bersagli
description.japanese: SIDE OPS『帰還兵排除』でターゲット2名を回収してクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите побочную миссию "Уничтожить предателей", эвакуировав обе цели
description.spanish: Completa la misión secundaria "Elimina la amenaza de los renegados" extrayendo a los dos objetivos.

description.brazilian: Complete a Op Paralela "Resgate do Agente de Inteligência" sem matar um inimigo sequer
description.english: Clear the "Intel Operative Rescue" Side Op without killing a single enemy
description.french: Terminer la mission secondaire "Sauver l'agent infiltré" sans tuer d'ennemi.
description.german: Schließe die Nebenmission "Agentenrettung" ab, ohne einen Feind zu töten.
description.italian: Completa la missione secondaria "Salvataggio agente segreto" senza uccidere un solo nemico
description.japanese: SIDE OPS『諜報員奪還』で敵を一人も殺さずにクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите побочную миссию "Спасение разведчика", не убив ни одного противника
description.spanish: Completa la misión secundaria "Rescata al agente de inteligencia" sin matar a un solo enemigo.

description.brazilian: Complete a Op Paralela "Aquisição de Informações Confidenciais" escondido na traseira de um caminhão
description.english: Clear the "Classified Intel Acquisition" Side Op while riding in the back of a truck
description.french: Terminer la mission secondaire "Récupérer des informations" à l'arrière d'un camion.
description.german: Schließe die Nebenmission "Geheiminformations-Beschaffung" ab, während du hinten im Lkw fährst.
description.italian: Completa la missione secondaria "Acquisizione info riservate" mentre siedi sul retro del camion
description.japanese: SIDE OPS『機密情報回収』でトラックの荷台に乗ったままクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите побочную миссию "Сбор разведданных", сидя в кузове грузовика
description.spanish: Completa la misión sec. "Consigue la información confidencial" desde la parte de atrás de un camión.

description.brazilian: Resgate e extraia todos os prisioneiros via helicóptero na Op "Destruir as plataformas antiaéreas"
description.english: In the "Destroy the Anti-Air Emplacements" Side Op, rescue and extract all prisoners via chopper
description.french: Dans la mission sec. "Détruire des postes antiaériens", extraire tous les détenus par hélico.
description.german: Hole in der Nebenmission "Zerstörung der Luftabwehrstellungen" alle Gefangenen mit dem Heli raus.
description.italian: In "Distruzione piazzuole anti aeree", salva ed estrai tutti i prigionieri con l'elicottero
description.japanese: SIDE OPS『対空兵器破壊』で全ての捕虜を救出してヘリに回収する
description.russian: В побочной миссии "Уничтожение точек ПВО", эвакуируйте всех заключенных на вертолете
description.spanish: En la misión sec. "Destruye las plataformas antiaéreas", extrae a los prisioneros en helicóptero.

description.brazilian: Recrie todas as cenas na Op Extra "Déjà-vu"
description.english: Recreate all scenes in the "Déjà-Vu" Extra Op
description.french: Recréer toutes les scènes de la mission supplémentaire "Déjà-vu".
description.german: Stelle in der Zusatzmission "Déjà-vu" alle Szenen nach
description.italian: Ricrea tutte le scene della missione extra "Déjà-vu"
description.japanese: EXTRA OPS『デジャヴ・ミッション』で全てのシーンを再現した
description.russian: Восстановите все сцены в дополнительной миссии "Дежавю"
description.spanish: Recrea todas las escenas en la misión extra "Déjà-vu".

description.brazilian: Complete a Op Extra "Jamais Vu" com 0 inimigos em estado de combate
description.english: Clear the "Jamais Vu" Extra Op with 0 enemy combat statuses
description.french: Terminer la mission supplémentaire "Jamais vu" avec 0 ennemi en situation de combat.
description.german: Schließe die Zusatzmission "Jamais-Vu" mit 0 Alarmen ab.
description.italian: Completa la missione extra "Jamais Vu" con 0 allerte combattimento nemici
description.japanese: EXTRA OPS『ジャメヴ・ミッション』を敵戦闘態勢数「0」でクリアする
description.russian: Пройдите дополнительную миссию "Жамевю", не подняв ни одной тревоги
description.spanish: Completa la misión extra "Jamais Vu" sin alertas de combate enemigo.

description.japanese: 全てのトライアルを開放する
全てのカセットテープを入手する

description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os emblemas da unidade XOF
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli stemmi dell'unità XOF
description.japanese: 全てのXOF部隊章を入手する
